name: Neon Dive
description:
Dive between buildings in Neon City. Defend yourself from enemy agents, sentry bots, and mines! Use your shock baton to chain combos to achieve high score.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, z or x to hit.

An entry into the March 2014 Cyberpunk Game Jam.

Developed by Bryan Whitney (@JustMakingGames).

Art by Lee Anderson (http://leeandersonart.com/).

Music and Sound by Matthew O'Hara-Ball (@MHaraBall).
